name: @atlaspack/profiler
description: Blazing fast, zero configuration web application bundler

scripts.build-ts: flow-to-ts src/*.js --write && rm -f ./src/*.d.ts && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --esModuleInterop --target es2015 --moduleResolution node16 --module node16 src/*.ts && mkdir -p lib && mv src/*.d.ts lib/. && rm src/*.ts && node build-ts.js
